title: KD3U
author: KD3U
content: For sale :Fully self contained 3-sided digital billboard trailerThis is a 3 sided billboard built on a new trailer with a 4Kw Generator. The sides are 3x6 foot and the end is 3x3. these are the same billboard components you see on highway billboards. 6.6 mm Pitch. The Billboard can run plugged into a 110VAC 15 amp standard outlet or run off the generator for about 1/2 gallon of gasoline per hour. Has a 5 Gallon racing fuel cell for about 10 hours of run time maybe a little more. The trailer is located in central Pennsylvania. Will deliver continental USA for fee.~ New Trailer~ 3 Sided digital Billboard with 6.6mm Pitch full color~ 4 Kw Generator~ Runs about 10-12 Hrs~ 110Vac 15 amp outlet or generator~ Easy to change content by the hour or month~Will deliver continental USA for FeeAsking 1 BITCOIN for Billboard Trailer1.75 Bitcoin to deliver anywhere continental USA if over 150 miles. The first 150 miles is 1.1 Bitcoin. Thanks Lee (717) 525-3066

comments.author: foggyb
comments.body: Hi there. Can you tell me more about the resolution of the display? Also, how well does the gas generator work, any required maintenance? And are there any emissions or noise regulations that would be of concern when using the trailer in places like California? Thanks!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Very interesting. I canâ€™t say I have a need for this personally, but it is an intriguing business on wheels for someone and maybe could advertise forum related projects someday. Would love to see pictures uploaded to the thread so we can put an image to the description. Good luck with your sale and any background about why you had this and if it operated as an advertising business would be welcome.

comments.author: bnbstorm
